features: HIGHLY PIGMENTED EYESHADOW ORCHID SHIMMER: Pink eyeshadow or purple eyeshadow? You don’t have to choose with this shimmery eyeshadow stick in pink-plum. With over 30 high-pigmented shades from Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic, you can build your own eyeshadow palette and go as understated or bold as the day (or night) calls for.
CREME-TO-POWDER WATERPROOF EYESHADOW: This waterproof, crème-to-powder eyeshadow stick glides effortlessly across lids before drying to a waterproof crease-proof powder finish.

NATURALLY EFFECTIVE INGREDIENTS VITAMIN C & E: This cream-to-powder eyeshadow stick does double-duty, thanks to the hydrating, nourishing formula with vitamin C & E. Delicate sensitive skin will love the vitamin E that protects against free radicals with antioxidants, and the vitamin C, which treats environmental damage to improve skin tone and texture. And candelilla wax makes every shade easy to blend, naturally.
NO BRUSH REQUIRED: Just glide and go. With smooth application, a built-in smudger for effortless blending, and a waterproof powder finish, you don’t need a brush to get the look you love.

HOW TO APPLY: Prime the smudger by coating it with color, then sweep the eyeshadow stick directly across your eyelids. Use the built-in smudger or your fingers to blend before the formula sets. For best results, prime the smudger by coating it with color prior to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These colors are beautiful, and it is so easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try these after I grabbed some on sale around Christmas time. They glide on so easy and the color is so beautiful. They go on like a cream and dry to a powder like feel, so your eyelids don't feel sticky. Each one also comes in with a built-in smudger which works great. I love the look and it lasts all day. I bought some for myself, my teenage daughter, my niece and my sister and we all LOVE it! I'll definitely be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent quality, waterproof, blendable
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy these are to use! One swipe, light blend, and I am out the door! Rich to sheer color, waterproof....lasts through a workout!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Goes on Sheer
reviews.reviewText: This eyeshadow is a nice color, but goes on much sheerer than you'd expect. Definitely have to build the color up. I would recommend putting on a primer first to hold the color longer. It does not last as long as some other stick shadows I have tried. I do really like how easy it is to use and the small size makes it easy to throw in your bag if you need to touch up later. Overall, a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This eyeshadow just glides on my eyelids, and stays put all day! I order 2 colors when they were on sale, and loved them so much I ordered 2 more! I think I may toss all of my old powder eyeshadow. I only wear the matted colors, as I'm a little older and don't really want shimmery shadow at this stage. Beautiful selection of colors too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great eye shadow.
reviews.reviewText: I somehow ran cross this eyeshadow and am so glad I did. What a great product and great value. Eyeshadow tends to not last long for me but this does. It is easy to apply and stays on all day long. So many great color choices too. I gifted some to my daughter and she loves it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received a used item! Color had unexpected glitter in it.
reviews.reviewText: I didn't get to try this out because I received a used item. (And it appears I'm not the only one.) I was able to get a close look at it, and I was immediately disappointed with the color "mixture." The item I selected wouldn't have worked for me, regardless of any other issue.I've been curious about these eyeshadow sticks for a long time. I wanted to test them out years ago, but they seemed kind of pricey for my budget. I don't like to spend more than I'm used to on an item I have no certainty will work as claimed. But then my friend told me she bought a stick on discount, and it was a game changer for her. (Easy to use, easy to blend, buildable color, quick application, lasts long, looks natural, etc.) She said she bought more and suggested I at least try one. She insisted they were worth the regular price... finding one on discount was just a bonus. We're very much alike in what we look for in beauty cosmetics, so I was intrigued. I also saw there were a ton more reviews on Amazon than the last time I checked, and the majority of them seemed highly positive. So, I went for it. I felt I had the amount of guarantee I needed to justify testing this thing out.I got the sheer shimmery pink color to use as a highlighter and on the inner corner of my eyes for a brightening effect. But that's not going to happen now. After I received my used product, I took a closer look at the reviews on Amazon - mostly to see if anyone mentioned unexpected problems with the same color I ordered. Instead, I noticed there were quite a bit of people who received what appeared to be used products, too!This is highly disappointing considering this brand seemed to have made a good name for itself over the last few years. I was really excited to finally try their infamously convenient and water-resistant eyeshadow stick. You'd think they'd be more careful about the products they're sending out - especially for what they're charging.My eyeshadow stick was undoubtedly used before I received it. Box was slightly crushed with signs of having been opened. The tip of the eyeshadow was smudged and there was product smeared on the outside of the barrel. If all that wasn't proof enough, the sponge tip had makeup residue on it as if someone fully tried every part of this thing out.I can't speak for the application and wear quality of the item because I'm not willing to risk transferring potential bacteria to my eyes, face, or even the back of my hand. I can say the expectation of the product was not met, right off the bat. I can also add that I was surprised that there looked to be big chunks of glitter in the shimmery sheer pink eyeshadow and on the sponge tip. (I wasn't expecting such large specks of actual GLITTER to be in the mix. It wasn't shown on the advertised photos or explicitly stated that cheap glitter would be used. I did expect some fine mineral-like shimmer, but not cheap glitter.)I'd suggest that if you buy this product, you thoroughly inspect it upon receiving it. Having cosmetics melt or break during shipment is one thing. But being sold a used product (advertised as new) is absolutely unacceptable. Especially, when there's evidence of it be a reoccurring issue for this particular product.I'm debating whether or not I want to try ordering another color - only because my friend was raving about this eyeshadow like it was the best product she has found to date. If I do decide to take another chance, I'd likely play it safe and choose a matte shade. I can handle some amount of "shimmer," but I feel I'm a bit too old and I don't get dressed up enough to decorate my eyes with glitter. (I cannot stress enough: This was straight up large specks of GLITTER - almost like you'd find in a craft store or in young teens' cheap & trendy makeup - mixed in with an otherwise nice looking shimmery/pearlescent color.)I'm just worried I'll get another used product... or that the product was otherwise kept in unsanitary/uncertain conditions before I received it. I just don't understand how this issue could happen so often. (Search thru the product reviews for yourself and count the number of complaints. You may not find it to be excessive, but I do. It really should be more of a rare occurrence. I haven't found this many complaints of used/questionable products when researching other cosmetics I'm also interested in trying.)Also, avoid the shimmery sheer light pink color... unless you're ok with random large specks of glitter. Then maybe go for it. The overall main color appeared nice with some shimmer to it already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The most fun part of my morning routine is selecting one of the many gorgeous shades of this eyeshadow that I now have and putting it on. They are so beautiful!! I love the lighter tones, and all in shimmer or metallic (no matte for me, thank you! I wear very minimal makeup and really enjoy the fun subtle sparkle on my lids). This goes on so easily, does not irritate the way that powder can, and honestly they're just such beautiful shades overall. I've made the mistake or purchasing a few dark ones that make my eyes look smaller (taupe, smoky grey), and also the meadow one which I really did not like; I was able to return these. But everything else I've tried has been gorgeous. I own at least 9 different ones now (Pearl, champagne, clove, honey gold, warm gold, sand, and more). LOVE LOVE LOVE :-))))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Charcoal Matte is less Charcoal more GREY
reviews.reviewText: If you are interested in this color just know it's a cool toned grey. It doesn't come up that color in the photos I tried to get so I didn't attach them. If you have brown toned skin just know it's not going to give a super dark black, or brown black or charcoal kind of a look. You'll get a soft mid tone cool grey. You can use it to achieve something like a smokey eye but it will be softer than what is likely your typical idea of a smokey eye. It's sort of a gun metal grey. Looks brown grey in the container and cool grey on the skin. I hope this helps.I'm giving 4 stars because it's not what I needed. It looks fine and it's workable. Smooth going on. Didn't irritate. But the product pictures don't make the color that it really is apparent.

reviews.reviewTitle: I keep reordering this eyeshadow. It's fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to apply and stays put all day with no smearing. I use the taupe shimmer. It is a subtle shimmer and suitable for any occasion. I use it everyday and hope it never goes out of stock.
So creamy and stays on all day
this is a total scam. good luck out there people
This eyeshadow is beautiful, I'm wish Amazon carried more colours. This is the nicest brand I've ever used. It is very high quality. Received it quickly. Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these eye shadow sticks. They are a cheaper version of the Kajal eye liners. They blend easily and you can increase the intensity of the colour by applying more. So quick and easy to apply! They stay on all day! Highly recommend! I will be buying in other colours.
